title: Virgil van Dijk
summary: Virgil van Dijk (born 8 July 1991) is a Dutch professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Premier League club Liverpool and the Netherlands national team. Considered one of the best defenders in the world,[4] Van Dijk is known for his strength, leadership and aerial ability.[5][6][7] He is the only defender to win UEFA Men's Player of the Year, and has finished runner-up for the Ballon d'Or and Best FIFA Men's Player.[8][9]
